name: Apple
description: A crisp and juicy fruit, perfect for a healthy snack or adding a sweet crunch to recipes.

name: Banana
description: A versatile and potassium-rich fruit, ideal for a quick energy boost or as an ingredient in smoothies and baked goods.

name: Carrot
description: A crunchy and sweet root vegetable, great for snacking, salads, or adding flavor to cooked dishes.

name: Potato
description: A staple and versatile vegetable, perfect for roasting, mashing, or frying, offering a comforting and satisfying base for many meals.

name: Tomato
description: A juicy and flavorful fruit often used as a vegetable, essential for sauces, salads, and countless culinary creations.

name: Bread
description: A fundamental food item, offering endless possibilities from sandwiches to toast, providing a versatile base for any meal.

name: Rice
description: A globally popular grain, serving as a versatile base for diverse cuisines, from stir-fries to pilafs.

name: Chicken
description: A lean and adaptable source of protein, great for grilling, roasting, or shredding into countless dishes.

name: Beef
description: A rich and savory meat, perfect for hearty stews, juicy steaks, or flavorful roasts.

name: Pork
description: A flavorful and versatile meat, excellent for roasts, chops, or savory charcuterie.

name: Egg
description: A versatile and protein-packed staple, perfect for breakfast, baking, or adding to various dishes.

name: Milk
description: A wholesome and nutritious dairy product, ideal for drinking, cereals, and a wide array of recipes.

name: Cheese
description: A beloved dairy product with countless varieties, perfect for snacking, cooking, or enhancing any dish.

name: Butter
description: A rich and creamy dairy product, essential for baking, cooking, and adding depth of flavor to savory and sweet dishes.

name: Yogurt
description: A tangy and creamy dairy product, great for breakfast, snacks, or as a base for sauces and dressings.

name: Lettuce
description: A crisp and refreshing leafy green, perfect for salads, sandwiches, and wraps.

name: Cucumber
description: A cool and hydrating vegetable, excellent for salads, refreshing drinks, or a light snack.

name: Onion
description: A pungent and versatile vegetable, fundamental for adding depth and flavor to almost any savory dish.

name: Garlic
description: A potent and aromatic bulb, indispensable for adding robust flavor to a vast range of cuisines.

name: Spinach
description: A leafy green vegetable packed with nutrients, great for salads, smoothies, or sautéing as a healthy side.

name: Salmon
description: A rich and flavorful fish, excellent for grilling, baking, or pan-searing, offering a healthy and delicious meal option.

name: Tuna
description: A lean and versatile fish, perfect for sandwiches, salads, or searing for a more gourmet meal.

name: Shrimp
description: Sweet and tender seafood, ideal for stir-fries, pasta dishes, or grilling.

name: Lamb
description: A tender and flavorful meat, often used in roasts, stews, or as a savory cut for special occasions.

name: Turkey
description: A lean and healthy poultry option, great for roasting, sandwiches, or ground in a variety of dishes.

name: Beans
description: A protein-rich legume, versatile for use in soups, stews, salads, or as a hearty side dish.

name: Lentils
description: A nutritious and earthy legume, perfect for soups, stews, or as a healthy addition to salads and grain bowls.

name: Peas
description: Sweet and vibrant green legumes, great for adding freshness to salads, stir-fries, or as a simple side dish.

name: Corn
description: A sweet and crunchy grain, delightful roasted, boiled, or added to salads and salsas.

name: Oats
description: A wholesome grain, perfect for a hearty breakfast porridge, baking, or adding fiber to your diet.

name: Pasta
description: A classic grain product, forming the base of countless Italian and international dishes, from simple buttered noodles to elaborate bakes.

name: Flour
description: A foundational grain product, essential for baking bread, cakes, and pastries, as well as thickening sauces and gravies.

name: Sugar
description: A common sweetener, used to add sweetness to desserts, beverages, and savory dishes alike.

name: Salt
description: An essential seasoning, used to enhance and balance flavors in virtually all cuisines.

name: Pepper
description: A widely used spice, adding a pungent kick to dishes, either freshly ground or pre-ground.

name: Chili
description: A fiery condiment, perfect for adding heat and depth to a variety of savory dishes.

name: Cinnamon
description: A warm and aromatic spice, perfect for baking, hot beverages, or adding a fragrant touch to savory dishes.

name: Basil
description: A fragrant herb, essential for Italian cuisine, pestos, and adding fresh flavor to salads and sauces.

name: Oregano
description: A pungent and earthy herb, a staple in Mediterranean and Mexican cuisines, great for pizzas, pasta, and roasted vegetables.

description: A fresh and vibrant herb, commonly used as a garnish or to add a bright, herbaceous note to soups, salads, and main courses.

name: Orange
description: A sweet and tangy citrus fruit, delicious on its own, in juices, or as an addition to desserts and savory dishes.

name: Grapes
description: Sweet and juicy berries, perfect for snacking, adding to fruit salads, or pairing with cheese.

name: Strawberry
description: A sweet and slightly tart berry, excellent in desserts, smoothies, or enjoyed fresh on their own.

name: Blueberry
description: Small, sweet, and antioxidant-rich berries, perfect for baking, breakfast, or as a healthy snack.

name: Watermelon
description: A refreshing and hydrating fruit, ideal for summer picnics and a sweet, juicy treat.

name: Pineapple
description: A tropical and tangy fruit, delicious fresh, grilled, or blended into smoothies and cocktails.

name: Mango
description: A sweet and tropical fruit, perfect for smoothies, desserts, or adding a burst of exotic flavor to savory dishes.

name: Coconut
description: A versatile tropical fruit, offering delicious water, creamy milk, and flavorful meat for a range of culinary uses.

name: Avocado
description: A creamy and nutritious fruit, excellent for guacamole, salads, toast, or as a healthy fat source.

name: Kiwi
description: A tangy and sweet fruit with a vibrant green interior, great for fruit salads, smoothies, or as a refreshing snack.

name: Almonds
description: A crunchy and nutritious nut, perfect for snacking, baking, or as an ingredient in various dishes.

name: Walnuts
description: A distinctively flavored nut, excellent for baking, salads, or as a healthy snack.

name: Cashews
description: A creamy and buttery nut, wonderful for snacking, making nut butter, or adding to stir-fries and curries.

name: Peanuts
description: A versatile and protein-packed legume, perfect for snacking, making peanut butter, or adding to Asian-inspired dishes.

name: Hazelnuts
description: A sweet and aromatic nut, commonly used in desserts, chocolates, and spreads, or enjoyed as a snack.

name: Sunflower Seeds
description: Crunchy and nutritious seeds, great for snacking, salads, or as a topping for baked goods.

name: Pumpkin Seeds
description: Flavorful and nutritious seeds, excellent for snacking, topping salads, or adding to granola.

name: Tofu
description: A versatile plant-based protein, excellent for absorbing flavors in stir-fries, curries, or grilling.

name: Tempeh
description: A fermented soybean product with a nutty flavor, perfect for plant-based dishes, absorbing marinades beautifully.

name: Mushrooms
description: Earthy and versatile fungi, great for adding umami to stir-fries, soups, sauces, or as a hearty side.

name: Zucchini
description: A mild and versatile squash, great for grilling, sautéing, baking, or adding to pasta dishes.

name: Broccoli
description: A nutrient-rich green vegetable, excellent steamed, roasted, or stir-fried as a healthy and flavorful side.

name: Cauliflower
description: A versatile and nutrient-packed vegetable, great roasted, mashed, or as a low-carb alternative in various dishes.

name: Brussels Sprouts
description: Small, flavorful cabbage-like vegetables, delicious roasted, sautéed, or shredded in salads.

name: Eggplant
description: A unique and spongy vegetable, great for grilling, baking, or in dishes like eggplant parmesan and curries.

name: Radish
description: A crisp and peppery root vegetable, perfect for adding a zesty crunch to salads or as a garnish.

name: Sweet Potato
description: A naturally sweet and nutritious root vegetable, excellent roasted, mashed, or baked as a healthier alternative.

name: Chickpeas
description: A protein-rich legume, perfect for hummus, falafel, salads, or roasted for a crunchy snack.

name: Quinoa
description: A highly nutritious ancient grain, great as a side dish, in salads, or as a base for vegetarian meals.

name: Barley
description: A hearty and nutritious grain, excellent for soups, stews, or as a wholesome side dish.

name: Noodles
description: A versatile grain product, forming the base of countless Asian and international dishes, from stir-fries to soups.

name: Soy Sauce
description: A savory and salty condiment, essential for Asian cuisines, marinades, and dipping sauces.

name: Ketchup
description: A classic sweet and tangy condiment, perfect for fries, burgers, and countless other dishes.

name: Mustard
description: A pungent and tangy condiment, ideal for sandwiches, hot dogs, or as an ingredient in dressings and sauces.

name: Mayonnaise
description: A creamy and rich condiment, essential for sandwiches, salads, and as a base for many dressings.

name: Vinegar
description: A versatile acidic liquid, great for salad dressings, marinades, pickling, or as a cleaning agent.

name: Honey
description: A natural and sweet liquid, perfect for tea, toast, baking, or as a glaze for savory dishes.

name: Maple Syrup
description: A natural and rich sweetener, ideal for pancakes, waffles, or adding a unique flavor to baking and glazes.

name: Jam
description: A sweet and fruity spread, perfect for toast, pastries, or as an ingredient in various desserts.

name: Pickles
description: Tangy and crunchy preserved cucumbers, great as a snack, on sandwiches, or alongside savory meals.

name: Sausage
description: A flavorful and versatile ground meat product, perfect for breakfast, grilling, or adding to pasta and stews.

name: Bacon
description: Crispy and savory cured pork, a popular breakfast item and flavorful addition to salads, sandwiches, and more.

name: Ham
description: A versatile cured pork product, great for sandwiches, roasts, or dicing into omelets and casseroles.

name: Duck
description: A rich and flavorful poultry, offering succulent meat and crispy skin, perfect for roasting or confit.

name: Goose
description: A robust and flavorful poultry, traditionally enjoyed roasted for festive occasions.

name: Crab
description: Sweet and tender seafood, delicious steamed, boiled, or in crab cakes and bisques.

name: Lobster
description: A luxurious and sweet shellfish, perfect steamed, boiled, or grilled, a true delicacy.

name: Clams
description: Briny and tender shellfish, excellent in pasta dishes, chowders, or steamed with garlic and wine.

name: Scallops
description: Sweet and delicate shellfish, superb seared to a golden brown, adding elegance to any meal.

name: Anchovies
description: Small, salty fish, packed with umami flavor, perfect for sauces, pizzas, or savory appetizers.

name: Ice Cream
description: A delightful frozen dessert, available in countless flavors, perfect for a sweet treat on its own or with other desserts.

name: Chocolate
description: A beloved sweet treat, perfect for snacking, baking, or adding a rich, decadent flavor to any dessert.

name: Cookies
description: A classic baked sweet treat, perfect for snacking, sharing, or dipping in milk.

name: Cake
description: A celebratory baked dessert, perfect for special occasions or as a sweet indulgence anytime.

name: Pie
description: A comforting baked dessert with a delicious filling, perfect for a satisfying sweet treat.

name: Muffin
description: A versatile baked good, perfect for breakfast, a snack, or a sweet treat with coffee or tea.

name: Pancake
description: Fluffy and versatile, perfect for breakfast with syrup, fruit, or savory toppings.

name: Waffles
description: Crispy on the outside and soft on the inside, a delightful breakfast or dessert item, perfect with various toppings.

name: Donut
description: A sweet, fried pastry, often glazed or filled, perfect for a delightful treat with coffee.

name: Brownie
description: A rich and fudgy chocolate baked good, perfect for a decadent dessert or a sweet pick-me-up.
